attributes.action: flood damage prevention major  population  movements
attributes.additional_details: Insurance firms will cease to pay out  on a repetitive basis for floods.  The government must right to  buy up unsaleable properties and move the occupants on eg to  Northumberland, or to  properties in Europe eg Spain.; cheaper than rebuilding  .   The EU directive on flood plans comes into effect in 2015 and the  UK must get something ready.
